pseudoclasses.pseudoclass: Matches any element that’s being activated by the user.
Matches elements like checkboxes or radio buttons that are checked.
Matches user interface elements that are disabled.
Matches elements that have no children.
Matches user interface elements that are enabled.
Matches any element that’s the first child element of its parent.
Matches the first child element of the specified element type.
Matches any element that’s currently in focus.
Matches elements that are being designated by a pointing device.
Allows elements to be matched on the basis of their languages.
Matches an element that’s the last child element of its parent element.
Matches the last child element of the specified element type.
Matches link elements that are unvisited.
Matches elements that aren’t matched by the specified selector.
Matches elements on the basis of their positions within a parent element’s list of child elements.
Matches elements on the basis of their positions within a parent element’s list of child elements. The counting starts from the last child.
Matches elements on the basis of their positions within a parent element’s list of child elements of the same type. The counting starts from the last child.
Matches elements on the basis of their positions within a parent element’s list of child elements of the same type.
Matches an element if it’s the only child element of its parent.
Matches an element that’s the only child element of its type.
Matches the element that’s the root element of the document.
Matches an element that’s the target of a fragment identifier in the document’s URI.
Matches link elements that have been visited.

pseudoelements.pseudoelement: Specifies content to be inserted after another element.
Specifies content to be inserted before another element.
Represents the first character of the first line of text within an element.
Represents the first formatted line of text.
Represents a part of the document that’s been highlighted by the user.

property.name: animation
property.syntax: name duration timing-function delay iteration-count direction
property.description: A shorthand property for all the animation properties, except the animation-play-state property

property.name: animation-delay
property.description: Specifies when the animation will start

property.name: animation-direction
property.description: Specifies whether or not the animation should play in reverse on alternate cycles

property.name: animation-duration
property.description: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds an animation takes to complete one cycle

property.name: animation-iteration-count
property.description: Specifies the number of times an animation should be played

property.name: animation-name
property.description: Specifies a name for the @keyframes animation

property.name: animation-play-state
property.description: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused

property.name: animation-timing-function
property.description: Specifies the speed curve of the animation

property.name: background
property.syntax: color position size repeat origin clip attachment image
property.description: Sets all the background properties in one declaration

property.name: background-attachment
property.description: Sets whether a background image is fixed or scrolls with the rest of the page

property.name: background-clip
property.description: Specifies the painting area of the background

property.name: background-color
property.description: Sets the background color of an element

property.name: background-image
property.description: Sets the background image for an element

property.name: background-origin
property.description: Specifies the positioning area of the background images

property.name: background-position
property.description: Sets the starting position of a background image

property.name: background-repeat
property.description: Sets how a background image will be repeated

property.name: background-size
property.description: Specifies the size of the background images

property.name: border
property.description: Sets all the border properties in one declaration

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: Sets all the bottom border properties in one declaration

property.name: border-bottom-color
property.description: Sets the color of the bottom border

property.name: border-bottom-left-radius
property.description: Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-left corner

property.name: border-bottom-right-radius
property.description: Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-right corner

property.name: border-bottom-style
property.description: Sets the style of the bottom border

property.name: border-bottom-width
property.description: Sets the width of the bottom border

property.name: border-color
property.description: Sets the color of the four borders

property.name: border-image
property.description: A shorthand property for setting all the border-image-* properties

property.name: border-image-outset
property.description: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box

property.name: border-image-repeat
property.description: Specifies whether the image-border should be repeated, rounded or stretched

property.name: border-image-slice
property.description: Specifies the inward offsets of the image-border

property.name: border-image-source
property.description: Specifies an image to be used as a border

property.name: border-image-width
property.description: Specifies the widths of the image-border

property.name: border-left
property.description: Sets all the left border properties in one declaration

property.name: border-left-color
property.description: Sets the color of the left border

property.name: border-left-style
property.description: Sets the style of the left border

property.name: border-left-width
property.description: Sets the width of the left border

property.name: border-radius
property.description: A shorthand property for setting all the four border-*-radius properties

property.name: border-right
property.description: Sets all the right border properties in one declaration

property.name: border-right-color
property.description: Sets the color of the right border

property.name: border-right-style
property.description: Sets the style of the right border

property.name: border-right-width
property.description: Sets the width of the right border

property.name: border-style
property.description: Sets the style of the four borders

property.name: border-top
property.description: Sets all the top border properties in one declaration

property.name: border-top-color
property.description: Sets the color of the top border

property.name: border-top-left-radius
property.description: Defines the shape of the border of the top-left corner

property.name: border-top-right-radius
property.description: Defines the shape of the border of the top-right corner

property.name: border-top-style
property.description: Sets the style of the top border

property.name: border-top-width
property.description: Sets the width of the top border

property.name: border-width
property.description: Sets the width of the four borders

property.name: box-shadow
property.syntax: h-shadow v-shadow blur spread color inset
property.description: Attaches one or more drop-shadows to the box

property.name: outline
property.description: Sets all the outline properties in one declaration

property.name: outline-color
property.description: Sets the color of an outline

property.name: outline-style
property.description: Sets the style of an outline

property.name: outline-width
property.description: Sets the width of an outline

property.name: overflow-style
property.description: Specifies the preferred scrolling method for elements that overflow

property.name: overflow-x
property.description: Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

property.name: overflow-y
property.description: Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

property.name: rotation
property.description: Rotates an element around a given point defined by the rotation-point property

property.name: rotation-point
property.description: Defines a point as an offset from the top left border edge

property.name: color-profile
property.description: Permits the specification of a source color profile other than the default

property.name: opacity
property.description: Sets the opacity level for an element

property.name: rendering-intent
property.description: Permits the specification of a color profile rendering intent other than the default

property.name: bookmark-label
property.description: Specifies the label of the bookmark

property.name: bookmark-level
property.description: Specifies the level of the bookmark

property.name: bookmark-target
property.description: Specifies the target of the bookmark link

property.name: float-offset
property.description: Pushes floated elements in the opposite direction of the where they have been floated with float

property.name: hyphenate-after
property.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters in a hyphenated word after the hyphenation character

property.name: hyphenate-before
property.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters in a hyphenated word before the hyphenation character

property.name: hyphenate-character
property.description: Specifies a string that is shown when a hyphenate-break occurs

property.name: hyphenate-lines
property.description: Indicates the maximum number of successive hyphenated lines in an element

property.name: hyphenate-resource
property.description: Specifies a comma-separated list of external resources that can help the browser determine hyphenation points

property.name: hyphens
property.description: Sets how to split words to improve the layout of paragraphs

property.name: image-resolution
property.description: Specifies the correct resolution of images

property.name: marks
property.description: Adds crop and/or cross marks to the document

property.name: height
property.description: Sets the height of an element

property.name: max-height
property.description: Sets the maximum height of an element

property.name: max-width
property.description: Sets the maximum width of an element

property.name: min-height
property.description: Sets the minimum height of an element

property.name: min-width
property.description: Sets the minimum width of an element

property.name: width
property.description: Sets the width of an element

property.name: box-align
property.description: Specifies how to align the child elements of a box

property.name: box-direction
property.description: Specifies in which direction the children of a box are displayed

property.name: box-flex
property.description: Specifies whether the children of a box is flexible or inflexible in size

property.name: box-flex-group
property.description: Assigns flexible elements to flex groups

property.name: box-lines
property.description: Specifies whether columns will go onto a new line whenever it runs out of space in the parent box

property.name: box-ordinal-group
property.description: Specifies the display order of the child elements of a box

property.name: box-orient
property.description: Specifies whether the children of a box should be laid out horizontally or vertically

property.name: box-pack
property.description: Specifies the horizontal position in horizontal boxes and the vertical position in vertical boxes

property.name: font
property.description: Sets all the font properties in one declaration

property.name: font-family
property.description: Specifies the font family for text

property.name: font-size
property.description: Specifies the font size of text

property.name: font-size-adjust
property.description: Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs

property.name: font-stretch
property.description: Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font family

property.name: font-style
property.description: Specifies the font style for text

property.name: font-variant
property.description: Specifies whether or not a text should be displayed in a small-caps font

property.name: font-weight
property.description: Specifies the weight of a font

property.name: content
property.description: Used with the :before and :after pseudo-elements, to insert generated content

property.name: counter-increment
property.description: Increments one or more counters

property.name: counter-reset
property.description: Creates or resets one or more counters

property.name: crop
property.description: Allows a replaced element to be just a rectangular area of an object, instead of the whole object

property.name: move-to
property.description: Causes an element to be removed from the flow and reinserted at a later point in the document

property.name: page-policy
property.description: Determines which page-based occurance of a given element is applied to a counter or string value

property.name: quotes
property.description: Sets the type of quotation marks for embedded quotations

property.name: grid-columns
property.description: Specifies the width of each column in a grid

property.name: grid-rows
property.description: Specifies the height of each column in a grid

property.name: target
property.description: A shorthand property for setting the target-name, target-new, and target-position properties

property.name: target-name
property.description: Specifies where to open links (target destination)

property.name: target-new
property.description: Specifies whether new destination links should open in a new window or in a new tab of an existing window

property.name: target-position
property.description: Specifies where new destination links should be placed

property.name: alignment-adjust
property.description: Allows more precise alignment of elements

property.name: alignment-baseline
property.description: Specifies how an inline-level element is aligned with respect to its parent

property.name: baseline-shift
property.description: Allows repositioning of the dominant-baseline relative to the dominant-baseline

property.name: dominant-baseline
property.description: Specifies a scaled-baseline-table

property.name: drop-initial-after-adjust
property.description: Sets the alignment point of the drop initial for the primary connection point

property.name: drop-initial-after-align
property.description: Sets which alignment line within the initial line box is used at the primary connection point with the initial letter box

property.name: drop-initial-before-adjust
property.description: Sets the alignment point of the drop initial for the secondary connection point

property.name: drop-initial-before-align
property.description: Sets which alignment line within the initial line box is used at the secondary connection point with the initial letter box

property.name: drop-initial-size
property.description: Controls the partial sinking of the initial letter

property.name: drop-initial-value
property.description: Activates a drop-initial effect

property.name: inline-box-align
property.description: Sets which line of a multi-line inline block align with the previous and next inline elements within a line

property.name: line-stacking
property.description: A shorthand property for setting the line-stacking-strategy, line-stacking-ruby, and line-stacking-shift properties

property.name: line-stacking-ruby
property.description: Sets the line stacking method for block elements containing ruby annotation elements

property.name: line-stacking-shift
property.description: Sets the line stacking method for block elements containing elements with base-shift

property.name: line-stacking-strategy
property.description: Sets the line stacking strategy for stacked line boxes within a containing block element

property.name: text-height
property.description: Sets the block-progression dimension of the text content area of an inline box

property.name: list-style
property.description: Sets all the properties for a list in one declaration

property.name: list-style-image
property.description: Specifies an image as the list-item marker

property.name: list-style-position
property.description: Specifies if the list-item markers should appear inside or outside the content flow

property.name: list-style-type
property.description: Specifies the type of list-item marker

property.name: margin
property.description: Sets all the margin properties in one declaration

property.name: margin-bottom
property.description: Sets the bottom margin of an element

property.name: margin-left
property.description: Sets the left margin of an element

property.name: margin-right
property.description: Sets the right margin of an element

property.name: margin-top
property.description: Sets the top margin of an element

property.name: marquee-direction
property.description: Sets the direction of the moving content

property.name: marquee-play-count
property.description: Sets how many times the content move

property.name: marquee-speed
property.description: Sets how fast the content scrolls

property.name: marquee-style
property.description: Sets the style of the moving content

property.name: column-count
property.description: Specifies the number of columns an element should be divided into

property.name: column-fill
property.description: Specifies how to fill columns

property.name: column-gap
property.description: Specifies the gap between the columns

property.name: column-rule
property.description: A shorthand property for setting all the column-rule-* properties

property.name: column-rule-color
property.description: Specifies the color of the rule between columns

property.name: column-rule-style
property.description: Specifies the style of the rule between columns

property.name: column-rule-width
property.description: Specifies the width of the rule between columns

property.name: column-span
property.description: Specifies how many columns an element should span across

property.name: column-width
property.description: Specifies the width of the columns

property.name: columns
property.description: A shorthand property for setting column-width and column-count

property.name: padding
property.description: Sets all the padding properties in one declaration

property.name: padding-bottom
property.description: Sets the bottom padding of an element

property.name: padding-left
property.description: Sets the left padding of an element

property.name: padding-right
property.description: Sets the right padding of an element

property.name: padding-top
property.description: Sets the top padding of an element

property.name: fit
property.description: Gives a hint for how to scale a replaced element if neither its width nor its height property is auto

property.name: fit-position
property.description: Determines the alignment of the object inside the box

property.name: image-orientation
property.description: Specifies a rotation in the right or clockwise direction that a user agent applies to an image

property.name: page
property.description: Specifies a particular type of page where an element SHOULD be displayed

property.name: size
property.description: Specifies the size and orientation of the containing box for page content

property.name: bottom
property.description: Specifies the bottom position of a positioned element

property.name: clear
property.description: Specifies which sides of an element where other floating elements are not allowed

property.name: clip
property.description: Clips an absolutely positioned element

property.name: cursor
property.description: Specifies the type of cursor to be displayed

property.name: display
property.description: Specifies how a certain HTML element should be displayed

property.name: float
property.description: Specifies whether or not a box should float

property.name: left
property.description: Specifies the left position of a positioned element

property.name: overflow
property.description: Specifies what happens if content overflows an element's box

property.name: position
property.description: Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element (static, relative, absolute or fixed)

property.name: right
property.description: Specifies the right position of a positioned element

property.name: top
property.description: Specifies the top position of a positioned element

property.name: visibility
property.description: Specifies whether or not an element is visible

property.name: z-index
property.description: Sets the stack order of a positioned element

property.name: orphans
property.description: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the bottom of a page when a page break occurs inside an element

property.name: page-break-after
property.description: Sets the page-breaking behavior after an element

property.name: page-break-before
property.description: Sets the page-breaking behavior before an element

property.name: page-break-inside
property.description: Sets the page-breaking behavior inside an element

property.name: widows
property.description: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the top of a page when a page break occurs inside an element

property.name: ruby-align
property.description: Controls the text alignment of the ruby text and ruby base contents relative to each other

property.name: ruby-overhang
property.description: Determines whether, and on which side, ruby text is allowed to partially overhang any adjacent text in addition to its own base, when the ruby text is wider than the ruby base

property.name: ruby-position
property.description: Controls the position of the ruby text with respect to its base

property.name: ruby-span
property.description: Controls the spanning behavior of annotation elements

property.name: mark
property.description: A shorthand property for setting the mark-before and mark-after properties

property.name: mark-after
property.description: Allows named markers to be attached to the audio stream

property.name: mark-before
property.description: Allows named markers to be attached to the audio stream

property.name: phonemes
property.description: Specifies a phonetic pronunciation for the text contained by the corresponding element

property.name: rest
property.description: A shorthand property for setting the rest-before and rest-after properties

property.name: rest-after
property.description: Specifies a rest or prosodic boundary to be observed after speaking an element's content

property.name: rest-before
property.description: Specifies a rest or prosodic boundary to be observed before speaking an element's content

property.name: voice-balance
property.description: Specifies the balance between left and right channels

property.name: voice-duration
property.description: Specifies how long it should take to render the selected element's content

property.name: voice-pitch
property.description: Specifies the average pitch (a frequency) of the speaking voice

property.name: voice-pitch-range
property.description: Specifies variation in average pitch

property.name: voice-rate
property.description: Controls the speaking rate

property.name: voice-stress
property.description: Indicates the strength of emphasis to be applied

property.name: voice-volume
property.description: Refers to the amplitude of the waveform output by the speech synthesises

property.name: border-collapse
property.description: Specifies whether or not table borders should be collapsed

property.name: border-spacing
property.description: Specifies the distance between the borders of adjacent cells

property.name: caption-side
property.description: Specifies the placement of a table caption

property.name: empty-cells
property.description: Specifies whether or not to display borders and background on empty cells in a table

property.name: table-layout
property.description: Sets the layout algorithm to be used for a table

property.name: color
property.description: Sets the color of text

property.name: direction
property.description: Specifies the text direction/writing direction

property.name: hanging-punctuation
property.description: Specifies whether a punctuation character may be placed outside the line box

property.name: letter-spacing
property.description: Increases or decreases the space between characters in a text

property.name: line-height
property.description: Sets the line height

property.name: punctuation-trim
property.description: Specifies whether a punctuation character should be trimmed

property.name: text-align
property.default-value: left if direction is ltr, and right if direction is rtl
property.description: Specifies the horizontal alignment of text

property.name: text-align-last
property.description: Describes how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned when text-align is "justify"

property.name: text-decoration
property.description: Specifies the decoration added to text

property.name: text-indent
property.description: Specifies the indentation of the first line in a text-block

property.name: text-justify
property.description: Specifies the justification method used when text-align is "justify"

property.name: text-outline
property.description: Specifies a text outline

property.name: text-overflow
property.description: Specifies what should happen when text overflows the containing element

property.name: text-shadow
property.description: Adds shadow to text

property.name: text-transform
property.description: Controls the capitalization of text

property.name: text-wrap
property.description: Specifies line breaking rules for text

property.name: vertical-align
property.description: Sets the vertical alignment of an element

property.name: white-space
property.description: Specifies how white-space inside an element is handled

property.name: word-break
property.description: Specifies line breaking rules for non-CJK scripts

property.name: word-spacing
property.description: Increases or decreases the space between words in a text

property.name: word-wrap
property.description: Allows long, unbreakable words to be broken and wrap to the next line

property.name: backface-visibility
property.description: Defines whether or not an element should be visible when not facing the screen

property.name: perspective
property.description: Specifies the perspective on how 3D elements are viewed

property.name: perspective-origin
property.description: Specifies the bottom position of 3D elements

property.name: transform
property.description: Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element

property.name: transform-origin
property.description: Allows you to change the position on transformed elements

property.name: transform-style
property.description: Specifies how nested elements are rendered in 3D space

property.name: transition
property.description: A shorthand property for setting the four transition properties

property.name: transition-delay
property.description: Specifies when the transition effect will start

property.name: transition-duration
property.description: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds a transition effect takes to complete

property.name: transition-property
property.description: Specifies the name of the CSS property the transition effect is for

property.name: transition-timing-function
property.description: Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect

property.name: appearance
property.description: Allows you to make an element look like a standard user interface element

property.name: box-sizing
property.description: Allows you to define certain elements to fit an area in a certain way

property.name: icon
property.description: Provides the author the ability to style an element with an iconic equivalent

property.name: nav-down
property.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-down navigation key

property.name: nav-index
property.description: Specifies the tabbing order for an element

property.name: nav-left
property.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-left navigation key

property.name: nav-right
property.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-right navigation key

property.name: nav-up
property.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-up navigation key

property.name: outline-offset
property.description: Offsets an outline, and draws it beyond the border edge

property.name: resize
property.description: Specifies whether or not an element is resizable by the user

property.name: azimuth
property.description: Sets where the sound should come from

property.name: cue
property.description: Sets the cue properties in one declaration

property.name: cue-after
property.description: Specifies a sound to be played after speaking an element's content

property.name: cue-before
property.description: Specifies a sound to be played before speaking an element's content

property.name: elevation
property.description: Sets where the sound should come from

property.name: pause
property.description: Sets the pause properties in one declaration

property.name: pause-after
property.description: Specifies a pause after speaking an element's content

property.name: pause-before
property.description: Specifies a pause before speaking an element's content

property.name: pitch
property.description: Specifies the speaking voice

property.name: pitch-range
property.description: Specifies the variation in the speaking voice. (Monotone voice or animated voice?)

property.name: play-during
property.description: Specifies a sound to be played while speaking an element's content

property.name: richness
property.description: Specifies the richness of the speaking voice. (Rich voice or thin voice?)

property.name: speak
property.description: Specifies whether content will render aurally

property.name: speak-header
property.description: Specifies how to handle table headers. Should the headers be spoken before every cell, or only before a cell with a different header than the previous cell

property.name: speak-numeral
property.description: Specifies how to speak numbers

property.name: speak-punctuation
property.description: Specifies how to speak punctuation characters

property.name: speech-rate
property.description: Specifies the speed of the speaking

property.name: stress
property.description: Specifies the "stress" in the speaking voice

property.name: voice-family
property.description: Specifies the voice family of the speaking

property.name: volume
property.description: Specifies the volume of the speaking
